meanings.definition: The process of shedding or peeling off outer layers.
meanings.sent1: Exfoliation helps to reveal fresh skin underneath.
meanings.sent2: Regular exfoliation can improve the appearance of your skin.
meanings.sent3: After exfoliation, my skin felt like it had a mini makeover.
meanings.sent4: Exfoliation is like a gentle scrubbing away of old layers.
meanings.sent5: The exfoliation process is like a refreshing reset button for your skin.

meanings.definition: The act of removing dead skin cells from the surface of the skin.
meanings.sent1: Proper exfoliation can prevent clogged pores.
meanings.sent2: Exfoliation is important for maintaining healthy skin.
meanings.sent3: I never knew exfoliation could make such a difference in my skincare routine.
meanings.sent4: Exfoliation is like a little skin rejuvenation session.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of smoothness after exfoliation is truly satisfying.
